quote: Never judge others. You both know good and well how unexpected events can change who a person is. Always keep that in mind. You never know what someone else is experiencing within their own life.
quote_letters: NEVER JUDGE OTHERS YOU BOTH KNOW GOOD AND WELL HOW UNEXPECTED EVENTS CAN CHANGE WHO A PERSON IS ALWAYS KEEP THAT IN MIND YOU NEVER KNOW WHAT SOMEONE ELSE IS EXPERIENCING WITHIN THEIR OWN LIFE
